documentation.text: @notice returns address of seller who has an NFT as collateral

collateralizedPurchase(address,address,a.details: the calling contract/function must approve the transfer to this contract address
collateralizedPurchase(address,address,a.notice: function transfers ownership from buyer to this contract to be held as collateralbuyer will automaticall receive thier NFT back once they repay the item value

exchangeNFT(address,address,address,uint.details: the calling contract/function must approve the transfer to the seller's address
exchangeNFT(address,address,address,uint.notice: function transfers ownership from buyer to seller

repay(address,address,uint256,uint256).notice: buyer pays back what they owe in WETH only

sellerCollateralNFT(address,address,uint.notice: returns address of seller who has an NFT as collateral

totalValueBorrowed(address).notice: returns the total eth quantity owed by a user

valueBorrowedOneNFT(address,address,uint.notice: returns value owed on 1 NFT used as collateral
